translation.en: [in English] Don't be a hero. Stay down! Hey!
translation.ko: 영웅 될 생각 말고 가만히 엎드려 있어, 어이!

translation.en: -[in English] I said down. -[man 2] Don't shoot.
translation.ko: 엎드리라니까 - 쏘지 마요, 제발 쏘지 마요 - 이리 와
- 쏘지 마요, 제발 쏘지 마요 - 이리 와

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is not a bank robbery.
So you stay calm and you go home.
translation.ko: 침착하게 있으면 무사히 집에 갈 수 있다
내 이름은 캘빈 쿠말로 "프리토리아 실버턴 로이발 발전소"

translation.en: I was born in Mabopane, where running water is a luxury.
translation.ko: 난 마보파네에서 태어났다 수돗물 쓰는 게 사치인 곳이었다

translation.en: My comrades and I grew up in apartheid South Africa,
translation.ko: 동지들과 내가 자란 아파르트헤이트 체제의 남아프리카 공화국은

translation.en: the most unequal society in the world.
We joined the liberation movement following the June 16 uprisings,
translation.ko: 수많은 또래 학생과 젊은이들이 희생당한 소웨토 항쟁 이후

translation.en: which left many of our peers dead.
With the majority of our leaders either imprisoned or in exile,
translation.ko: 지도자 대다수가 투옥 중이거나 추방 상태였기에

translation.en: the youth have made it their responsibility
to put an end to this unethical system.
translation.ko: 이 비윤리적인 체제에 종지부를 찍는 책임을 맡았다
국가를 통제 불가의 상태로 만드는 것이었다

translation.en: The white minority regime has left us with only one option.
translation.ko: 소수의 백인으로 된 정권에서 우리가 쓸 수 있는 방법은 하나뿐이었다

translation.en: Our orders from high command were simple.
Sabotage strategic key points in the capital,
Comrades, Seahorse supplies oil to the South African Defense Force.
translation.ko: 동지들 시호스는 남아프리카 방위군에 석유를 공급하는 곳이야

translation.en: You take the supply and power.
translation.ko: 그럼 보급이랑 전력 수급도 막히는 거지

translation.en: [Khumalo] We plant the explosives and hit as many fuel tanks as possible.
translation.ko: 폭발물을 설치해서 원유 탱크를 최대한 많이 날려버리는 거야

translation.en: [Khumalo] There's no need for me to tell you that if we get caught,
translation.ko: 잡히게 되면 말 안 해도 알지?

translation.en: there will be no prison time.
The truck driver should be here any minute.
We get the signal from him and we move. Fast.

translation.ko: 늦는군 - 이럼 안 되잖아 - 걸어서 가면 안 돼?
- 이럼 안 되잖아 - 걸어서 가면 안 돼?

translation.en: We need the truck driver for gate access.
translation.ko: 트럭 기사만 정문을 통과할 수 있어

translation.en: Are you sure it's the right location? I mean, mistakes happen, huh?

translation.ko: 쿠말로는 착각 같은 거 안 해

translation.en: These guys have been off the radar for so long,
translation.ko: 한참 동안 감시망에 안 잡히던 놈들인데

translation.en: but instead of fleeing, they come back to the capital,
one of the most protected cities in the whole damn country.
translation.ko: 하필 전국에서 방비가 제일 철저한 도시에요?

translation.en: Uh, it makes no sense, man.
It's the heart of their fight.
An explosion at the Rooiwal Power Plant near Pretoria early yesterday morning
translation.ko: 어제 이른 아침 프리토리아 부근에서 일어난 로이발 발전소 폭발로

translation.en: has left thousands of homes without electricity
and caused millions of rands worth of damage.
This is the latest in a series of sabotage acts by the terrorists
translation.ko: 이번 폭발 사고는 최근 잇따르는 테러리스트들의 파괴 행위의 가장 최근 사례로

translation.en: that have rocked large cities across South Africa…
[radio] …causing speculation that a state of emergency might…
translation.ko: 그 결과 비상사태가 선포될 가능성이 점쳐지고…

translation.en: [radio in English] Anyone with information, contact Captain Langerman…
translation.ko: 관련 정보를 아는 분은 랑에르만 반장에게 제보해…

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] Team MK. Go MK!
[in Zulu] Where are you going now?
[in English] One's coming out. Get ready! Get ready!
Move back! He is coming towards you. Move back!
translation.ko: 차 뒤로 빼요 그쪽으로 가고 있어요
흑인 여자가 다 보는 데서 담배를 피워?

translation.en: -[Khumalo] Get back inside. Let's go! -That's our guy!
translation.ko: - 얼른 도로 타, 가자! - 저기 트럭 기사 왔어!

translation.en: Are we doing this or what?
-That's not him. That's not our driver. -[Terra] What?
translation.ko: - 저 사람은 아니야 - 뭐? - 우리 쪽 기사가 아니라고 - 그럼 누군데?

translation.en: -[man 2] Who is he? -I don't know. Something's wrong.
translation.ko: - 우리 쪽 기사가 아니라고 - 그럼 누군데? 몰라, 뭔가 이상해

translation.en: [in English] Baker. I think he's gonna bolt.
[Langerman] I want them alive! Do not shoot!
Masego, can't this thing go faster? Move, man!
translation.ko: 마세고, 더 빨리 못 가? 밟으라고!

translation.en: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Piss off! I'll kill you!
Get this thing out of here! Come on! Get it out!
-[in Zulu] Let's go! -[in English] Trying to kill us. Move!
translation.ko: - 밟아! - 우릴 죽일 작정이야 환장하겠네 그대로 가, 계속 밟아!

translation.en: [in Zulu] You're driving right past it!
[in English] We got set up, man!
-Go, Masego! Let's move. -[Terra, in Zulu] Masego, no way man!
[in Zulu] Comrades, get moving. We need to find a way out.
translation.ko: 동지들, 서둘러 빠져나갈 방법을 찾아야 해

translation.en: [Terra] Masego! Wake up! What do you think you're doing?
translation.ko: 마세고, 정신 차려! 지금 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: Masego, don't do this to me!
[in English] Terra, Terra, we need to go.
No. Go, go, go. I'll stay with him.
-Terra, we have to leave. -[in Zulu] Go. Quickly, go.
translation.ko: - 테라, 가야 해 - 빨리 가 얼른 가, 가라고

translation.en: [in English] Terra… Mbali. We need to go. Mbali!
translation.ko: - 테라 음발리, 여길 떠야 한다고 - 테라 음발리!

translation.en: [man, in Afrikaans] I think it's Pieter!
-[Langerman, in English] It's clear. -[man] He's still breathing.
translation.ko: 차는 비었다 아직 숨이 붙어 있어요

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Hold on, buddy, hold on.
It's the same van they used for the Rooiwal job.
[in Afrikaans] Hold on, they are on their way.
[man, in Afrikaans] Men, search the building.
[in English] I want this whole building turned upside down!
They must be here somewhere, Malan!
[in Afrikaans] Go up there! Every car as well.
translation.ko: 이 잡듯이 뒤져! 차량도 전부 확인해!

translation.en: -[yells] Here, here! -[Khumalo, in Zulu] Let's get out of here!
[officer, in Afrikaans] Get out of the way!
-[in Zulu] Let's go, guys! -[Aldo, in English] Go!

translation.ko: - 캘빈, 괜찮아? - 계속 가야 해 캘빈, 뛸 수 있겠어?

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] Let's go! [Aldo, in English] Move!
Keep going! [in English] Move! Let's go!
-[Terra, in Zulu] This way. -[Khumal, in English] Everybody move!

translation.ko: - 달려! - 계속 가! - 그대로 달려! - 뛰어!

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] What kind of shit is this?
Hold your fire. I repeat, hold your fire!
[in Zulu] Gents, what are we going to do?
Well, hello to you too, beautiful.
By the way, you are definitely in the wrong line.
[in Afrikaans] What you think you're doing, boy?
[in English] Excuse me? Um, who you calling a boy?
Don't play dumb with me. You're in the wrong line.
translation.ko: 어물쩍 넘어갈 생각 마 이 줄이 아니잖아

translation.en: Get your hands off me. I'm an American.
translation.ko: 이 손 당장 놓으시지 나 미국인이라고

translation.en: Well, you're in Africa now, boy!
He's the American citizen that phoned in yesterday.
Damn Skippy. What? A man can't breathe?
translation.ko: 그래, 그게 이 몸이다 왜, 열받아 죽겠냐?

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] You didn't say he's Black.
[in Afrikaans] Johan, let him go. Johan.
I deal with dumbass rednecks all the time.
translation.ko: 백인 꼰대들 상대하는 덴 도가 텄어요

translation.en: This is now a hostage situation.
Nobody goes in this bank, nobody goes out.
We need a command post over there.
Captain, they're already shooting at the hostages.
translation.ko: 반장님, 벌써 인질들한테 총을 쏘고 있어요

translation.en: No, not yet. It's too soon.

translation.ko: - 엎드리라니까 - 쏘지 마요 - 제발 쏘지 마요 - 이리 와
- 제발 쏘지 마요 - 이리 와 - 이쪽으로 와서 엎드려 - 야, 거기 너!
- 이쪽으로 와서 엎드려 - 야, 거기 너!

translation.en: this is not a bank robbery.
So you stay calm and you go home.
translation.ko: 침착하게 있으면 무사히 집에 갈 수 있다

translation.en: Okay. Please don't shoot me. I have a two-year-old daughter.
translation.ko: 제발 쏘지 말아요 두 살 난 딸내미가 있어요

translation.en: And if you want to see her again, don't try any tricks.
translation.ko: 딸내미 다시 보고 싶으면 허튼짓하지 마

translation.en: Money's in the vault. Just don't hurt anyone.
translation.ko: 돈은 금고에 있어요 제발 아무도 해치지 말아요

translation.en: Take the money. Just don't hurt anyone.
[woman] I could show you where the vault is.

translation.ko: - 이름이 뭐지? - 크리스틴요 내가 여기 책임자예요

translation.en: Is there a back way out?
Looks like this one has issues.
[in Zulu] Ladies too. [in English] Let's go!
Captain. I think we might have something.
translation.ko: 반장님 도움 될 만한 건이 있어요

translation.en: I'm not moving. I'm not going anywhere. Whatever…
translation.ko: 난 안 가, 꼼짝도 안 할 거야
- 그게 뭐든… - 누군데? - 난 겁 안 나 - 이름은 제인

translation.en: She claims to be related to the bank supervisor.
A woman, white, by the name of Christine. She says she can help.
translation.ko: 책임자는 크리스틴이란 백인 여자고요 자기가 도울 수 있다는데

translation.en: Let's keep her close. We might need her later.
translation.ko: 근처에 있게 해 나중에 필요할지도 몰라

translation.en: I can't go out like this.
[in English] Just get your mind off it.
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 그 생각 하지 마

translation.en: Khumalo has a lot of explaining to do.
translation.ko: 쿠말로한테 어떻게 된 건지 들어야 해

translation.en: [Aldo] Someone in high command sold us out.
If anyone comes near those windows,
Calvin Khumalo, Aldo Erasmus, Mbali Terra Mabunda.
translation.ko: 캘빈 쿠말로 알도 에라스무스 음발리 테라 마분다

translation.en: We have the entire building surrounded.
[in Zulu] How's he know our names?
Never mind our names. How did he know about the mission?
translation.ko: 이름이 중요해? 우리 임무는 어떻게 안 거지?

translation.en: [in English] Surrender your weapons and come out with your hands above your head.
translation.ko: 무기를 버리고 양손 머리 위로 들고 밖으로 나와라

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Maybe the truck driver? -No. All the truck driver knew
translation.ko: 트럭 기사가 꼰질렀나? 아니, 트럭 기사는 우리 이름 몰랐어

translation.en: was to meet us there and drive us in. That's it.
translation.ko: 기사가 아는 건 우리 태워서 안에 데려다주기로 한 게 다야
근데 저 짭새는 다 꿰고 있잖아

translation.en: [in English] Someone had to have told him.
[Langerman] I repeat, Calvin, we have the building surrounded.
translation.ko: 반복하겠다, 캘빈 현재 건물 전체가 포위됐다

translation.en: I lost Masego today. Don't piss me off.
translation.ko: 마세고도 죽었는데 더 꼭지 돌게 하지 마

translation.en: There were other units on the Seahorse mission.
translation.ko: 우리만 시호스 임무에 투입된 게 아니잖아

translation.en: [Langerman, in English] Come out with your hands above your head.
[in Afrikaans] I'm Captain Langerman. South African Police.
How do you know our names?
We've been tracking you for months.
translation.ko: 몇 달 동안 너희를 추적해 왔다

translation.en: We know you were behind the Rooiwal job.
translation.ko: 로이발 사건도 너희 짓이란 걸 알고 있다

translation.en: You don't speak Afrikaans, yet you call yourself a South African?
Your people have been here 400 years
and you haven't bothered to learn an indigenous language,
translation.ko: 이 땅 고유의 말을 배우려는 노력조차 안 했지

translation.en: yet you call yourself a South African?
Let's not get off on the wrong foot. Okay?
By taking over this square and this bank,
you're spitting in the face of the Afrikaner nation.
translation.ko: 아프리카너 국가의 면전에 침을 뱉는 거나 같다

translation.en: I don't give a damn about the Afrikaner nation.
They've taken apart my family, and they've taken apart many more.
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 물론 수많은 가족을 생이별시킨 놈들이라고

translation.en: My point is that it is going to be up to you and me to resolve this.
translation.ko: 내 말은 우리 둘이서 이 상황을 해결해야 한단 거다

translation.en: Otherwise, it's going to end badly.
This is what's going to happen.
Me and my comrades are going to walk out of here safely.
translation.ko: 나랑 동지들은 여기서 무사히 살아 나갈 계획이야

translation.en: Unless you want us to start throwing bodies out the door.
translation.ko: 그게 안 되면 문밖으로 시체를 던지기 시작할 거다

translation.en: Nobody needs to get hurt, Calvin.
I'll get you what you want.
And I want safe passage to a location of our choosing,
translation.ko: 그리고 우리가 지정한 곳까지 안전한 경로를 확보해

translation.en: which I will tell the pilot once we're airborne, no tricks.
[Khumalo] Captain, we have an American citizen in here.
translation.ko: 반장, 여기 미국 국적자가 하나 있다

translation.en: this could get messy very quickly.
But better it gets messy out here than in the bank.
Get me the helicopter. Let's get them outside.
You are going back to Khensani.
[Khumalo] After this, you'll be holding your newborn baby in your arms.
translation.ko: 이 일만 끝나면 갓난애를 품에 안게 될 거야

translation.en: I know today has been a rough day.
I know we lost Masego. But…
we've been through far worse situations.
And… -And Terra hasn't killed anyone yet. So… -[Aldo laughs]
We would like to thank you for your kind cooperation.
translation.ko: 호의적으로 협조해 준 것 고맙게 생각한다
그리고 이런 불편을 겪게 만든 걸

translation.en: We did not intend to be here. But here we are.
translation.ko: 여기를 점거할 뜻은 없었지만 상황이 이렇게 됐다

translation.en: Unfortunately, for me and my comrades to depart,
Man, I'm Black, just like you. I ain't got nothing to do with this.
translation.ko: 이봐, 나도 그쪽처럼 흑인이잖아 난 이 일이랑 아무 상관도 없다고

translation.en: You do make a valid point.
-How long you been in the police force? -I'm not.
translation.ko: - 경찰에 몇 년이나 있었지? - 경찰 아니에요

translation.en: So don't try any tricks. Move.
[in English] Targets are now entering the helicopter.
Copied, Captain. We're clear. We are clear.
[Khumalo] What are you doing? Schoeman, what do you hear?
Aldo, man. You have to trust me. Come, let's move!
translation.ko: 알도, 날 믿어! 지금 가야 해!

translation.en: [in English] Hostage breaking away. Do not fire. I repeat, do not fire.
translation.ko: 인질이 도주하려고 한다 발포는 금지한다 반복한다, 발포는 금지한다

translation.en: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Come out of there, you dog. Come out!
[in English] Back to the bank! Everybody move!
The hostage in the white shirt is not American. He's a Boer.
translation.ko: 흰 셔츠를 입은 사내는 미국인이 아니라 보어인이다

translation.en: -[Johan, in Afrikaans] Shoot! -[Langerman, in English] Do not fire.
translation.ko: 젠장, 왜 안 쏘는 건데? 발포는 금지한다, 대기하라

translation.en: I see you, you messed up!
You are alone now. Do you hear me?
[in English] Huh? Triple seven. A Black white supremacist.
[in Zulu] You're a piece of crap.
translation.ko: - 네가 아는 거랑 달라 - 개자식 넌 쓰레기야

translation.en: [Aldo] I knew they weren't gonna let us fly away.
translation.ko: 이럴 줄 알았어 순순히 보내 줄 리가 없지

translation.en: I'll show you sorry, son of a bitch.
I should have just killed you myself.
-You selfish piece of shit! -Go to hell, Terra!
translation.ko: 마세고는 어쩌라고 이기적인 자식! 지옥에나 가라, 테라

translation.en: [Terra] You'll go to hell! I'll show you hell.
translation.ko: 지옥은 너나 가 - 내가 보내 주마 - 관둬!

translation.en: [in Zulu] He nearly had us killed.
translation.ko: 이 새끼 때문에 다 죽을 뻔했어

translation.en: [in English] We'd be dead if it wasn't for him, okay?
[Terra] Get in… Let's go. [in English] Move!
-[pilot, in English] Okay. -[Terra, in Zulu] Let's go.
[in English] Big men with guns, huh?
But you're nothing but a bunch of terrorists.
[in English] Busy working for the white man? Get up, boy!
translation.ko: 백인들 챙기느라 수고 많았지? 일어나, 덩치야!

translation.en: On your bloody knees. On your bloody knees. Shit!
translation.ko: 무릎 꿇어 무릎 꿇으라고, 망할 놈아

translation.en: -Who is the bloody informer? -[pilot] I don't--
-[pilot gasping] -[in Zulu] Talk! -I don't know. -[Terra] Lies!
[in English] I don't know. I'm just a pilot.
Because of people like him, Masego is dead.
[in English] The police knew about the Seahorse Oil mission
translation.ko: 경찰이 시호스 오일 임무를 알고 있었어

translation.en: See, the way I see it, you have two options.
translation.ko: 내가 보기엔 너한텐 두 가지 선택이 있어

translation.en: Tell me nothing and die in this bank, or…
translation.ko: 아무 말도 안 하고 이 은행에서 죽든가

translation.en: you tell me who the informant is
I wasn't part of the operation.
They put the gun in the helicopter so I could take you out
translation.ko: 윗선에서 숨겨 둔 거야 그럼 내가 헬기에서 너희를 처리할 수 있으니까

translation.en: once you told us your location.
They would be waiting for you there…
You have to realize one thing.
There's only one of two ways you're leaving this bank.
translation.ko: 너희가 이 은행을 나가면 둘 중 하나야

translation.en: Just when you think your day couldn't get any worse.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 죽겠는데 사람 돌게 만드는군

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] The Little Crocodile is here.
[man, in English] Units are taking over operational command.
The Big Crocodile is dying to see you. And he's on the warpath.
translation.ko: 큰 악어께서 자네를 빨리 보고 싶어 하셔 단단히 벼르고 계시지

translation.en: -Brigadier, we've been on this case-- -[Brigadier] I'm not talking to you.
translation.ko: - 이 건은 저희가 몇 달간 작업… - 자네는 빠져

translation.en: I know what it is, Schoeman.
But why is it standing there? In front of Uncle Paul?
translation.ko: 헬기가 왜 크루거 동상 앞에 있지?

translation.en: Have you seen the bank manifest?
The Justice Minister's daughter, Christine, is one of the hostages.
translation.ko: 법무부 장관의 딸 크리스틴이 인질로 잡혀 있다는군

translation.en: With all the horses, the dogs, the guns, the soldiers, and everything.
translation.ko: 말, 개, 무기에 군인들까지 총동원해서 말이야

translation.en: [Khumalo, in English] What's in that case?
Why don't you say we make a deal, huh?
Look, I don't want your money, okay?
Come on, man. Who doesn't want money, huh?
translation.ko: 왜 이래, 형씨 돈 싫은 사람이 어딨다고

translation.en: You know that big fight with John Tate and Gerrie Coetzee, huh?
translation.ko: 존 테이트랑 헤리 쿠체랑 붙었던 거 알아?

translation.en: Well, how about Nelson Mandela? You know Mandela, right?
Hey, so we have a deal or what?
Excuse me. When do we get to leave?
These people need food and water
and they need to relieve themselves, please.
-[in English] They're won't let us out. -I'm not surrendering.
translation.ko: - 놈들은 우릴 안 보내 줄 거야 - 난 절대 투항 안 해

translation.en: They've been trying to kill us since the depot.
translation.ko: 놈들은 택시 정류장에서부터 우릴 죽이려고 했어

translation.en: I know I've never let you guys down before, but…
translation.ko: 그동안 한 번도 너희를 실망시킨 적 없지만

translation.en: This could be our last mission.
if our lives are worth nothing, then maybe…
Maybe we negotiate for a life that is worth everything.
translation.ko: 정말 중요한 한 사람을 위해 협상하는 데 써 볼 순 있지

translation.en: This is the prime minister. He doesn't negotiate.
translation.ko: 상대는 총리야 협상이 안 통하는 놈이라고

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] Khumalo. You're starting again.
But what if we turn this into a movement?
translation.ko: 하지만 우리가 이걸 거대한 운동으로 만들면?

translation.en: A movement? We need permission from high command.
translation.ko: 운동? 그러려면 지도부의 허가부터 받아야 해

translation.en: In here we are high command.
I told you if you didn't comply with my demands,
translation.ko: 난 분명히 말했어 우리 요구에 응하지 않으면 대가가 따른다고
우리 요구에 응하지 않으면 대가가 따른다고

translation.en: What are you talking about? I complied, I delivered your helicopter.
Hey, that wasn't a helicopter, that was a setup.
I don't want your helicopter, Captain.
How do you expect to get out of here?
You've got to talk to me.
Tell me what it is you want.
We want the immediate release of Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela.
translation.ko: 우린 넬슨 롤리랄라 만델라의 즉각 석방을 원한다

translation.en: We want a presidential pardon from the prime minister,
and we want it in writing, Captain.
You have one hour to get me a signed copy of that presidential pardon.
translation.ko: 서명된 사면증 사본을 한 시간 내로 가져와

translation.en: Then an hour after that, we want him released in full public view.
translation.ko: 그러고 나서 한 시간 후에 만델라가 석방되는 장면을 대중에게 공개하는 거다

translation.en: Then me and my comrades will surrender.
Captain, what's the price of freedom?
[Khumalo, in Zulu] Let's not give them any other way.
[in English] This is gonna need some serious motivation.
Then let's give it to them.
[in English] …to keep all of us, no matter what side, safe
translation.ko: 어느 편에 서 있든 우리 모두를 안전하게 지켜주시고

translation.en: and grant us safe passage out the bank.
translation.ko: 이 은행을 무사히 나가도록 인도해 주십시오

translation.en: So that Ernie can celebrate his daughter Karmen's second birthday.
translation.ko: 그리하여 에르니가 딸 카르먼의 두 살 생일을 축하할 수 있도록 해주십시오
곧 태어날 아들 사이먼을 위해 기도합니다

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory. Amen.
translation.ko: 나라와 권세와 영광이 아버지께 영원히 있사옵니다 아멘

translation.en: They want the release of Nelson Mandela.
In exchange, they'll release the hostages
Okay. Come on, Calvin. Here we go.
Please, we have a pregnant woman here.
This is inhumane. You can't just keep us here all day.
translation.ko: 여기 계속 있게 하는 건 비인간적이에요

translation.en: You darkies are all the same.
Let me hear you say "darkie" one more time.
We are thirsty and we are starving.
And I have a flight to catch.
translation.ko: 난 이따 비행기 타러 가야 하고요

translation.en: [in English] We are working on it. Okay?
I hope you're calling me to tell me you have my letter.
translation.ko: 내가 요구한 문서는 준비하고 전화한 거겠지?

translation.en: Calvin, you know we're considering everything,
translation.ko: 캘빈, 우리도 가능한 방법을 다 검토하고 있지만

translation.en: The release of a man like Mandela isn't done at the snap of a finger.
translation.ko: 만델라 같은 인물을 풀어주는 건 간단하지가 않다고

translation.en: [Aldo] What the hell are you doing?
[in Zulu] Khumalo, what are you doing?
Man, I ain't come here for this.
This is bull, that's what it is.
[in English] Keep an eye on them.
[SWAT leader] Brigadier, they're coming out. The door's opening.
[in English] Hold your fire. Hold your fire.
They're coming outside. This is progress.
translation.ko: 놈들이 나오고 있어 진전이 있는 거다

translation.en: -[Brigadier, in Afrikaans] Take them now. -No, wait, Brigadier,
translation.ko: 지금 해치워 버려 그래선 안 됩니다 기다려 보시죠, 준장님
그래선 안 됩니다 기다려 보시죠, 준장님

translation.en: [Langerman] No, one of those three isn't one of our suspects.
translation.ko: 저 셋 중 하나는 용의자가 아닙니다

translation.en: I didn't say he's one of our suspects. I gave you an order.
Calvin is cunning as a jackal.
[in Afrikaans] He wouldn't just expose himself like that.
translation.ko: 이유 없이 자신을 노출할 리 없어요

translation.en: I think that man might be a hostage.
[in Afrikaans] Now you listen to me, Captain.
[in English] Brigadier, permission to engage? We have a clear shot.
Nobody fires unless I say so.
translation.ko: 내 지시가 있기 전까지 발포 금지다

translation.en: Wait. Mr. Officer, hold on now.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 경찰 양반, 내 말 들어요

translation.en: I think there's a big misunderstanding.
I don't want no trouble. This has nothing to do with me.
translation.ko: 괜히 문제 일으키지 말자고 난 상관없는 일이잖아

translation.en: -I ain't even from here. -You're home now, brother.
translation.ko: - 상관이 왜 없어 - 난 여기 사람도 아니라고 여긴 네 고향이야, 형제, 제발 좀!

translation.en: That's right. I'm an American. I'm a boxing promoter.
I shouldn't even be here. Please, take me with you.
translation.ko: 여기 있으면 안 돼요 제발 데려가 줘요

translation.en: I'm not gonna ask you again.
[Langerman] Nobody is shooting anything. We're still negotiating.
translation.ko: 누구도 쏴선 안 된다 아직 협상이 진행 중이다

translation.en: -[crowd] Free Nelson Mandela, free him! -[Khumalo] Free Nelson Mandela!
Calvin, release some of the hostages.
Will be a sign of good faith.
Maybe you don't understand what I'm talking about.
The next thing I wanna hear from you is that you received that pardon.
translation.ko: 사면증 받아 오기 전엔 이래라저래라 하지 마

translation.en: If you don't, I'm burning more money and more money.
translation.ko: 아니면 계속해서 돈을 태워 버릴 거야

translation.en: Well, then… you know what happens.
[all in Zulu] Power to the people! Power to the people!
[in Afrikaans] You nearly caused an international incident.
I couldn't care less that he's American.
Get rid of this damn disturbance. I do not want to hear them!
translation.ko: 시끄러워 죽겠으니까 쫓아 버려! 듣기 싫다고!

translation.en: And I ain't gonna be the one to pay for it.
translation.ko: 그리고 내가 그 값을 대신 치르진 않을 거야

translation.en: As long as one of us is in chains, none of us are free.
translation.ko: 우리 중 하나가 억압당하는 한 우린 절대 자유로울 수 없어

translation.en: [in Zulu] That bloody captain is a piece of shit.
[in English] I don't care what Khumalo says,
if I get a chance to avenge Masego, I'm going to do it.
translation.ko: 기회 되는 즉시 마세고의 원수를 갚겠어

translation.en: Captain Langerman will get what he deserves.
[in English] I'm bleeding. I need the bathroom, please.
[in Zulu] Erasmus, please deal with this dog before I kill him.
translation.ko: 저 자식은 네가 상대해 난 죽여 버릴지도 몰라

translation.en: I almost got shot. That's what happened.
translation.ko: 나 총 맞을 뻔했어요 죽는 줄 알았다니깐요

translation.en: They were talking about freeing Mandela.
-And they made me burn the money. -What?
I'm gonna go talk to him.
[in Afrikaans] Christine, you mad? What do you think you're doing?
[in English] You're not in this alone, Miss Fancy Pants. Coming with you.
translation.ko: 잘난 아가씨 혼자 나서지 말고 같이 가요

translation.en: -We need to talk to you. -About what?
We've asked for food and water. We haven't received any.
translation.ko: 물이랑 먹을 걸 부탁했는데 언제쯤 받을 수 있죠?

translation.en: You know, from the moment you walked into this bank,
you messed up everyone's life, including your own.
translation.ko: 댁 포함 여기 모두가 파리 목숨 된 거 알지?

translation.en: I messed up everyone's life? Me?
translation.ko: 나 때문에 그렇게 됐다고? 나 때문에?

translation.en: I'm not the reason you're standing in a line you shouldn't be.
translation.ko: 당신들이 줄 잘못 선 건 나 때문이 아니야

translation.en: -Doesn't matter what line I stand in. -[Khumalo] It shouldn't.
translation.ko: 내가 어느 줄인지는 안 중요해 그렇겠지

translation.en: But we live in a country where it does for people like us.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 나라에서 우리 같은 사람한테는 중요하거든

translation.en: I think we're more alike than you'd like to admit.
You think you're special, different from the rest.
translation.ko: 자기가 특별하고 남들이랑은 다른 줄 알지

translation.en: Does that remind you of anyone?
Maybe you're right. But that still doesn't change the fact
translation.ko: 당신이 옳을 수도 있지만 그래도 달라질 건 없어요

translation.en: that what you're trying to do here is impossible.
You know, a man once said,
"It always seems impossible until it's done."
That's a wise man and those are beautiful words.
How are you gonna get out of here?
The police consider Mandela to be the highest form of terrorist.
translation.ko: 경찰은 만델라를 극도로 위험한 테러리스트로 보고 있어요

translation.en: Burn all the money you want, they won't release him.
translation.ko: 여기 돈을 다 태운다 해도 풀어줄 리 없다고요

translation.en: I don't have to explain myself to any of you.
And that wise man, that wise man who said that,
translation.ko: 아까 그 말을 남긴 현명한 사람이 누군지 알아?

translation.en: That's the man we're trying to free.
[pilot] You know, it's only a matter of time before the police come in here.
translation.ko: 경찰이 여기 들이닥치는 건 시간 문제야

translation.en: When they do, they'll kill you and everyone else in here.
translation.ko: 그럼 넌 물론 여기 있는 사람들 다 죽겠지

translation.en: I don't wanna be caught in the crossfire.
[Aldo] Hey, tell someone who gives a shit, okay?
translation.ko: - 총알받이 될 거 아냐 - 야 그딴 소리 하면 누가 쫄까 봐?

translation.en: You ought to give a shit.
I ought to kill you myself if we don't start moving.
translation.ko: 빨랑 안 움직이면 내 손에 뒈질 줄 알아

translation.en: [in English] The minute you start releasing hostages…
I want to be the first on that list.
And why would I do that?
I'll tell your friends who the real informant is.
translation.ko: 네 친구들한테 누가 정보원인지 말해 줄 거야

translation.en: Remember, we know where your wife is.
Listen to me. No one can find out about this.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 이 일은 우리 둘만 아는 거야

translation.en: If they do, they'll storm this bank.
translation.ko: 놈들이 알면 여기로 밀고 들어올 거야

translation.en: You've got blood on your hands, Comrade.
Hey, we want food and water.
I can do that for you, but I need a favor in return.
translation.ko: 그건 해줄 수 있지 대신 대가가 필요해

translation.en: But I need one of them to be Christine.
The bank just wants their female supervisor out of there safely.
translation.ko: 은행 측에서 여성 책임자가 무사히 풀려나길 바라고 있어

translation.en: Just bring that food and water.
You're doing a good thing, son.
So, the police asked me to release you specifically, Christine.
translation.ko: 경찰에선 특별히 크리스틴 당신을 풀어 달라고 요청했다

translation.en: Okay, well, you are free to go.
I'm not walking out those doors.
[in English] If she doesn't want to go, I'll take her place. Pass me my bag.
translation.ko: 본인이 싫다니 내가 대신 나가 주지 내 가방 줄래요?

translation.en: Christine, I suggest you go before I change my mind.
translation.ko: 크리스틴, 나 마음 변하기 전에 나가는 게 좋을걸

translation.en: I'm not going to leave these people here.
They're my responsibility. I can't just abandon them.
translation.ko: 내가 책임져야 할 분들을 버리고 갈 순 없어요

translation.en: You can take Susan in my place.
Come help me get the food.
-[in Afrikaans] Doesn't wanna come out. -[in English] Why not?
How am I supposed to know? Maybe she likes the ambiance in there.
translation.ko: 난들 알아? 저 안 분위기가 좋나 보지

translation.en: I gave you two hostages, okay. We need that letter, Captain.
translation.ko: 인질 둘 줬으니 됐지? 내가 말한 문서 가져와, 반장

translation.en: [Langerman] She won't come out of the bank.
Captain. What if we use that old lady over there?
translation.ko: 반장님, 저 노인을 이용해 보면 어떨까요?

translation.en: We could use her to persuade Christine to come out of the bank.
translation.ko: 저 여자를 이용해서 크리스틴이 나오도록 설득할 수도 있어요

translation.en: Let me explain something to you both.
You want us to turn a maid
into a heroine on national television?
translation.ko: 전국 방송 앞에서 영웅으로 만들어 주자는 건데

translation.en: How desperate do you want us to look? Hmm?
translation.ko: 그랬다간 우리가 똥줄 타는 것처럼 보인다고

translation.en: If your plan doesn't work, mine will.
translation.ko: 자네 방법이 안 통하면 내 식대로 하겠네

translation.en: [Aldo in English] Come! Bathroom break is over.
-Hurry up. Don't have all day. -[Khumalo coughing]
-Or else I'll kill him. I'll kill him. -Calm down.
translation.ko: - 안 그럼 이 자식 죽일 거야! - 진정해
이 자식 죽인다고! 총 버려! - 총 내려놔! - 내가 못 죽일 거 같냐?

translation.en: -[all shouting] -Look! Look at me! I'm moving back.
translation.ko: - 이봐, 나 좀 봐! - 진정해 뒤로 가고 있잖아, 총 내려놓을게

translation.en: I'm moving back. I'm putting it down.
It's a five shooter. You're out.

translation.ko: 쿠말로, 죽여 버려 우리 적은 밖에 있는 놈들이야

translation.en: [in English] The enemy's outside, not in here. No civilian casualties.
translation.ko: 우리 적은 밖에 있는 놈들이야 민간인을 죽여선 안 돼

translation.en: But if any of you guys try that again, there will be consequences.
translation.ko: 하지만 또 이러는 놈이 나오면 쓴맛을 보게 될 거다, 알아들어?

translation.en: Do you understand me? I told you, you stay calm, you go home.
translation.ko: 쓴맛을 보게 될 거다, 알아들어? 침착하게 있으면 보내 준다고 했잖아

translation.en: Ernie, you just got a promotion. Go lock up your boss.
translation.ko: 상사라고 쫄지 말고 데리고 가서 묶어

translation.en: [in Zulu] Terra, let me have a look…
What? Is there any way we can help?
-I don't know. Do what you can. -[telephone ringing]
Calvin, we heard gunshots. What is happening in there?
Thirty minutes, I just need 30 more minutes.
[Khumalo, in English] Why didn't you leave?
You had every opportunity to go, but you didn't take it.
This has nothing to do with me. So I demand to leave right now.
translation.ko: 나랑은 상관없는 일이잖아 당장 내보내 줘

translation.en: [Khumalo] You don't get to make demands.
What's stopping me from killing you right now?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 지금 널 안 죽이게?

translation.en: Like you did the pilot in the vault? Go ahead. Shoot me.
translation.ko: 금고의 조종사 꼴 만들게? 해봐, 쏘라고

translation.en: White friends, spoke English your whole life.
translation.ko: 친구들도 백인이고 평생 영어를 썼을 거야

translation.en: you can hide behind your history.
translation.ko: 넌 네 과거를 숨길 수 있단 거야

translation.en: Maybe get away with it because of how you look.
translation.ko: 그 외모 덕에 과거에서 벗어날 수 있었겠지

translation.en: and your money to keep up the façade.
But you can't run away from who you really are.
You think it's easy being me, looking the way that I do?
translation.ko: 쉬웠을 거 같아? 나처럼 태어나서 이런 모습으로 살아가는 게?

translation.en: People constantly sniggering and debating who I am.
translation.ko: 사람들은 늘 내 정체를 갖고 자기들끼리 떠들면서 비웃어

translation.en: And you know nothing about the choices I've had to make.
translation.ko: 내가 어떤 선택을 해야 했는지 쥐뿔도 모른다고

translation.en: But if the police find out…
You know, all day I've been thinking who the informant could be.
translation.ko: 정보를 넘긴 게 누굴까 종일 생각해 봤어

translation.en: And I just thought maybe Masego.
This makes me think… maybe Terra.
She's got a heart of gold.
No offense, but this ain't for you.
translation.ko: 기분 나쁘게 듣진 마시고 목사가 할 일은 아니죠

translation.en: I want to help too, if you'd allow.
You can put the gun to my head if that'll help.
translation.ko: 필요하면 내 머리에 총을 대도 돼

translation.en: Do as I say and you'll be safe.
translation.ko: 시키는 대로만 하면 아무 일 없을 거야

translation.en: Why are you doing this again, Calvin?
What you've asked for is not easy to deliver.
translation.ko: 네가 요구한 건 쉬운 일이 아니야

translation.en: -And you know it. -Maybe you don't understand!
translation.ko: 너도 알잖아 상황 파악 좀 하지그래? 여유 부릴 시간 없다고!

translation.en: You have run out of time, Captain.
translation.ko: 상황 파악 좀 하지그래? 여유 부릴 시간 없다고!

translation.en: You know what? I think I'm done burning money.
Maybe I should burn this building, this square,
translation.ko: 이 건물, 이 광장까지 다 태워 줄까?

translation.en: or maybe Uncle Paul over there!
translation.ko: 아예 저 크루거 동상도 태워 버려?

translation.en: I will burn this whole country down if it takes it.
translation.ko: 필요하다면 이 나라 전체를 불바다로 만들 거야

translation.en: Why don't you give them what they want? Let sanity prevail!
translation.ko: 이 사람들 요구대로 해줘요 정당한 편에 손을 들어 주자고요

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Pastor. [in English] I'm doing my best.
In order for this to work, I need Calvin to help me.
translation.ko: 이 일을 해결하려면 캘빈이 나한테 협조해야 해요

translation.en: You are not a partner. You're not helping me.
translation.ko: 당신은 목사도 아니야 도움이 안 된다고!

translation.en: Try harder and deliver on your promises.
translation.ko: 더 노력해서 나랑 한 약속 지켜
- 반장님, 총리님 문서가 왔어요! - 캘빈, 잠깐!
캘빈, 이것 봐 네가 요구한 문서야 사면과 석방을 확인하는 성명서

translation.en: It's a pardon and a statement of release.
translation.ko: 네가 요구한 문서야 사면과 석방을 확인하는 성명서

translation.en: I'm gonna bring it to you.
They're going to do it, Calvin.
This… This is just a letter.
Okay, well… when are you actually releasing him?
Calvin, wait. Wait. Listen to me.
translation.ko: 캘빈, 있어 봐, 내 말 좀 들어

translation.en: In order for this to work,
I need to come inside and make sure that all hostages are okay.
translation.ko: 내가 들어가서 인질이 전부 무사한지 확인해야 해

translation.en: Just so you know, Captain. This?
[Terra] Khumalo, what does he want in here?
[in English] We're gonna release Mandela, Terra. It's okay.
translation.ko: 만델라를 석방할 거다 테라, 걱정하지 마

translation.en: You get my name out of your mouth. Hear me?
translation.ko: 그 입에 내 이름 올리지 마

translation.en: I've been asked to make sure everybody's okay.
translation.ko: 모두 무사한지 확인해 달라는 요청을 받았습니다

translation.en: We're working to get you out of here, okay?
[in Afrikaans] People outside are worried about you.
Calvin, please. I need to take the girl.
translation.ko: 캘빈, 부탁하네 저 여자를 데리고 가야 해

translation.en: It seems she feels safer in here than out there, Captain.
translation.ko: 저 여자는 바깥보다 여기를 더 안전하게 느끼나 본데

translation.en: And I think you've seen everything you need to see.
The pilot, Sechaba Maselemola, where is he?
Know what, Captain? I think you've overstayed your welcome.
Put your leg on the table.
[in Zulu] Terra, what are you doing?
It's not what it looks like.
Khumalo, you see. He can't be trusted.
translation.ko: 쿠말로, 봤지? 이 자식 믿으면 안 돼

translation.en: Calvin, I am not lying to you.
-[Khumalo] For your sake! It better. -Please. Please.
translation.ko: - 살고 싶으면 사실대로 말해 - 제발 부탁이야

translation.en: Calvin, no one needs to get hurt, please.
Calm down. I'll put my gun down.
translation.ko: 흥분하면 안 돼 내가 먼저 총 내려놓을 테니까

translation.en: Aldo, you… you put your gun down.
Then, Terra? You put your gun down. Okay?
Terra, I need you to put your gun down.
I think you should leave now. Right now, go.
translation.ko: 얼른 가는 게 신상에 좋아 당장 나가

translation.en: [Terra] Your name is Langerman? Yes or no?
Terra, how do you know his name?
translation.ko: 테라, 저 작자 이름은 어떻게 알았어?

translation.en: I never told any of you his name, so how do you know it?
translation.ko: 난 말한 적 없는데 어떻게 알았어?

translation.en: He mentioned Langerman's name when none of us knew it.
translation.ko: 우리 다 이놈 이름을 모를 때 랑에르만이라고 했었지

translation.en: Captain Langerman will get what he deserves.
[voice breaks] Is it true, Aldo? Did you…
[in Zulu] I should shoot you in the head.
[Brigadier in Afrikaans] I agree, Honorable Minister.
I will make absolutely sure of it.
One of them just died. They're vulnerable.
translation.ko: 놈들은 방금 하나가 죽고 기세가 꺾인 상태입니다

translation.en: [Langerman] We can find a peaceful solution.
You think that after what happened in there
When I was in the bank
I saw a man who wasn't prepared to pull the trigger.
translation.ko: 녀석은 사람을 죽일 의도가 없다는 겁니다

translation.en: He could have kept me hostage but he didn't. Why?
translation.ko: 저를 인질로 잡을 수도 있었는데 그러지 않았죠 왜 그랬을까요?

translation.en: I think this whole situation, the violence, the murder
translation.ko: 제가 보기에 녀석은 이 모든 상황, 폭력, 살인에

translation.en: You want me to believe that damn terrorist in there
translation.ko: 지금 나더러 저 안에 있는 테러리스트 놈이

translation.en: And he doesn't want to lose more people.
translation.ko: 사람들이 더 희생되는 걸 원하지 않아요

translation.en: You think that trash in there
[Christine in English] I have an idea…
I don't have anything for you.
I have police outside. I've got hostages in there.
I just want a moment alone.
When I was eight my mother died.
And a month or so after her death, Jane came into my life.
translation.ko: 그 일이 있고 한 달쯤 후에 제인이 나한테 왔죠

translation.en: Who's Jane? Who the hell's Jane? I don't… Can you leave? Please just leave!
translation.ko: 제인은 또 누군데? 나 좀 내버려 둬, 제발 가라고

translation.en: She was my nanny, but so much more than that.
translation.ko: 제인은 유모였지만 나한텐 그 이상으로 중요한 사람이에요

translation.en: Okay, she taught me about love for all and equality.
translation.ko: 제인이 만인에 대한 사랑과 평등에 대해서 말해줬어요

translation.en: She said that ubuntu is our duty.
What do your people know about ubuntu?
What do you know about humanity?
[in Zulu] We are only human through other human beings.
translation.ko: 인간은 다른 인간과 함께할 때만 인간다울 수 있다

translation.en: We are only human through other human beings.
translation.ko: 인간은 다른 인간과 함께할 때만 인간다울 수 있다

translation.en: That's why they wanted you out. [laughs]
I once witnessed my father take another man's life.
Killed him like it was nothing.
He got killed because he was Black. We get killed because we are Black.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 흑인이란 이유로 죽었지 우린 흑인이란 이유로 살해당해

translation.en: We're kept poor because we are Black.
There's no pain in your privilege.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 특권층이 그런 고통을 알아?

translation.en: My father and the people who work for him,
translation.ko: 아버지와 그 밑에서 일하는 사람들을 보며…

translation.en: they represent everything that I don't want to become.
And that's why I'm going to help you.
She has something to say. So listen.
translation.ko: 여자가 할 말이 있대, 잘 들어

translation.en: Captain, these men are not criminals.
They didn't come here for the money.
They came to send a message.
That all they want is freedom.
I know you can see me.
Do what they ask. Please. Do the right thing.
translation.ko: 제발 이들의 요구를 들어주세요 옳은 일을 하세요

translation.en: -[Khumalo] Free him! -[Christine] Free Mandela! Free him!
[in Afrikaans] Officers, come and fetch this woman. [Langerman, in English] Cease fire!
translation.ko: - 누가 이 여자 좀 데려가 - 발포 중지!

translation.en: Where did that shot come from?
[Khumalo] Get me some towels. Please, hurry.
[Ernie sobs] Come on, Christine. Come on.
translation.ko: 정신 차려요, 크리스틴 눈 좀 떠 봐요

translation.en: I thought I saw a threat.
A threat? A white woman, a threat?
You shot the Minister of Justice's daughter in public.
translation.ko: 넌 공공장소에서 법무부 장관의 딸을 쐈어

translation.en: This is going to cost you your career.
[in Afrikaans] It's a matter of national security.
[in Afrikaans] Don't let them worry you.
[in English] That's the only picture that I've ever kept.
Our home was a safe house in Mabopane.
I grew up seeing strangers walking in and out of my house
translation.ko: 낯선 사람들이 우리 집을 드나드는 걸 보며 자랐어
다들 위장을 하고 있었지 경찰이 들이닥치기도 했고

translation.en: And when I was a little boy,
I watched my parents on their knees
[sighs] I made a promise to myself.
That I wouldn't stop until I avenged them.
That choice brought me to the MK.
translation.ko: 그 선택이 날 민족의 창, MK로 이끌었어

translation.en: So, I actually lived in Mamelodi with my mother.
She was doing pretty well for herself until she had me.
translation.ko: 어머니는 나름 잘 살고 있었지 그러다 날 낳았고

translation.en: Kids never wanted to play with me.
she gave me up for adoption to her employers.
translation.ko: 어머니는 날 자기 고용인들한테 입양 보냈어

translation.en: [in Zulu] Khumalo, you have a phone call.
[Langerman, in English] Calvin, are you there?
[Langerman] The brigadier is sending in the SWAT team. It's out of my control.
translation.ko: 준장이 특수 기동대를 투입할 거야 이제 나도 손쓸 수 없어

translation.en: Spend some time with your wife.
[in English] What's the price of freedom?
-[Brigadier, in Afrikaans] Move in. -[officer, in English] Move in!
[Terra, in Zulu] This will be easy!

translation.ko: - 자식들 혼이 쏙 빠졌을 거야 - 내 말이

translation.en: You know those dogs got me.
With your hands on your head, now.
♪ All the sea is cold And the sky is gray ♪
translation.ko: "훗날 넬슨 만델라 석방 운동을 일으킨 불씨가 됐다" "만델라는 1990년 2월 11일 석방됐으며"

translation.en: ♪ Look across an island into the bay ♪
